name: Save The Bunnies
description:
Story:

A mysterious fog clouded a forest where an extremely large group of bunnies lived. Due to the fog, the Bunnies begin to attack anyone who is not a bunny. You must survive a full week in this forest and save the souls of every infected bunny.

Controls:

WASD = Move
Mouse = Aim
Left Click = Shoot
Space Bar = Pick up upgrades
